import React from "react"; import { baseURL } from "../global"; const pkm = { abilities: {0: "Blaze", H: "Solar Power"}, baseStats: {hp: 39, atk: 52, def: 43, spa: 60, spd: 50, spe: 65}, catchRate: 45, desc: "It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.", dexNumber: 4, eggGroups: (2) ["Monster", "Dragon"], evolvesTo: ["Charmeleon"], genderRatio: {M: 0.875, F: 0.125}, height: 0.6, name: "Charmander", types: ["Fire"], weight: 8.5, } class DexPokemonCard extends React.Component { constructor (props) { super(props) } render() { const hpPercent = "calc(100% * {this.props.baseStats.hp} /255)" return(
{/*

{this.props.pokemon}

*/}

{this.props.name}

{"Dex no: " + this.props.dexNumber}

{this.props.desc}

{"Type: " + this.props.types}

{"Height: " + this.props.height + "m"}

{"Weight: " + this.props.weight + "kg"}

{"Egg group: " + this.props.eggGroups}

); } } class StatBar extends React.Component { render() { return( {/* HP */} {/* ATK */} {/* DEF */} {/* SPA */} {/* SPD */} {/* SPE */}
Stat
HP:
{this.props.baseStats.hp}

SPA:

SPD:

); } } export default DexPokemonCard;
